Input: I want to have a dislike button so I can dislike posts
There is a post I strongly disagree with and I want to give a thump down
I want to have an overview of the posts I gave a like a while back
So I can see these posts again
I want to see posts from my friends and not posts from other pages
Now I see a lot of posts I don't want to see
I want Facebook to support the function that I can draw something on my photos
I want to make something clear and the function to draw something on photos makes that easier
I want Facebook to translate my posts to multiple languages
So my friends, who can't read English very well, can also read my posts
